sentences.en: Anyone who dared to peek was condemned to death.
sentences.cn: 任何敢偷看的人被定死罪.

sentences.en: Companies have been paying outrageous fees for a peek at the technical data.
sentences.cn: 各公司一直在为该技术资料的一窥支付惊人的费用。

sentences.en: Gordon: Let's take a peek at Gene Hackman's life and career.
sentences.cn: 戈登: 让我们来看看吉恩·海克曼的生平.

sentences.en: Here's a peek into the Zen of threading for game developers.
sentences.cn: 本文将讲述游戏线程化的开发者之禅.

sentences.en: I took a peek at the list.
In this paper, the processing technology of glass fibre reinforced polyetheretherketone ( PEEK ) composites analysis of microphotograph.
sentences.cn: 本文初步探索了玻璃纤维增强聚醚醚酮 ( PEEK ) 复合材料的成型工艺.

sentences.en: It is possible that PEEK University is curable in air.
sentences.cn: 在空气气氛中,聚醚醚酮存在热交联的可能.

sentences.en: Just getting a peek at the text proved difficult.
sentences.cn: 一瞥手稿面目却是十分困难的.

sentences.en: Larry takes a peek out of the window.
sentences.cn: 赖瑞往窗外偷看了一下.

sentences.en: Paula opened the box and peeked inside.
sentences.cn: 葆拉打开盒子往里看了一眼。

sentences.en: PEEK housings and pump heads contribute high stiffness and temperature and chemical resistance.
sentences.cn: PEEK外壳和泵压头有助于高刚度,温度和耐化学性.

sentences.en: Peek in the window and see if anyone is home.
sentences.cn: 从窗子看看是否有人在家.

sentences.en: Peek through delicate iron gates at the well - kept gardens.
sentences.cn: 仔细留心法国人对于细节的留心.

sentences.en: Poly ( ether ether ketone ) ( PEEK ) is a kind of high performance engineering plastics.
sentences.cn: 聚醚醚酮 ( PEEK ) 是一种性能优异的工程塑料.

sentences.en: Shut your eyes and don’t peek!
The kangaroo mother allowed a peek inside her pouch for this picture.
sentences.cn: 小袋鼠的母亲允许摄影师拍摄它育儿袋中的小生命.

sentences.en: There also weren't enough sales clerks for peek hours.
sentences.cn: 售货高峰期间售货员人数不够.

sentences.en: You must not peek while you are counting in such games as hide - and - seek.
sentences.cn: 象 捉 迷藏一类游戏中,你数数时绝对不能偷看.

trans.tran_en: to look quickly at something, or to look at something from behind something else, especially something that you are not supposed to see
